functions.title: Graves Addon
pages:
A Guide to the Graves Addon

          BLOCKS:

Darksteel:
  Darksteel is an ore found in the overworld, nether, & end. It can be mined with an iron pickaxe or better & smelted down into ingots. Graveyards & some other structures

can contain Darksteel in their chests. Darksteel can be made into Bricks and Tiles when combined with deepslate.

Darksteel Lights and Runes:
  These are decorative blocks made with darksteel and eonite. Both of these blocks can be found in Dark Ruins.

Gleaming Dark Bricks:
  This variant of Dark Bricks can be made with Shining Dust. It is a luminous decor block. 

Gravestone:
  Gravestones can be crafted with stone & darksteel or found naturally in graveyards. If a gravestone is found
there,

then it can summon wraiths when interacting with it. If the player places a gravestone, then it can be used to set a spawn point instead of a bed.

Spectral Eonite:
  This ore is found rarely underground in the overworld or from the Demonic Wraith's drops.

It can be smelted into an ingot and then crafted into a staff when combined with Darksteel.

           ITEMS:

Ancient Tome:
  This rare item can be found in graveyard chests and can be used on a wraith to spawn the Demonic Wraith.

Forgotten Sword:
  This sword is an uncommon item found in graveyard chests, for it is a sword that has 512 durability & 10 attack damage. It can be repaired with Darksteel.

Ghost Pepper:
  This hauntingly good food item is dropped rarely from Wraiths or

Demonic Wraiths. Eating it will restore food points, and will grant Invisibility, Darkness, Resistance, Asorption, & Regeneration. Now that's one spicy pepper!

Shining Dust:
  This rare pile of grains can be found in Dark Ruin chests or dropped by the

Demonic Wraith. it is a primary ingredient in making the Gleaming Dark Bricks, which are the upgraded version of Dark Bricks.

Spectral Eonite Staff:
  This item can only be crafted with Darksteel & Spectral

Eonite. The staff can be repaired with Darksteel & Spectral Eonite Ingots. It has 200 durability and 3 attack damage. The special thing about this staff is it can be right-clicked to deal 5 damage to all undead in a 5-block range around you. This, however,

takes 3 durability off of your staff.

          MOBS:

Demonic Wraith:
  This variant of the wraith can only be summoned by interacting with a wraith while holding an Ancient Tome.

STATS:
  HP: 250,
  Attack: 15 (Melee),
  5 (Sonic Blast)
  Drops: 0-1 Spectral Eonite Staff
  0-3 Darksteel Scrap
  0-3 Diamond
  0-1 Spectral Eonite Ingot

Wraith:
  This Mob can only be spawned when right-clicking a Gravestone. it is a semi-weak mob & will disappear in sunlight.

STATS:
  HP: 20
  Attack: 3
  Drops: 0-2 Bone
  0-1 Darksteeel Scrap

STRUCTURES:

Graveyard:
  This structure is found in the overworld at Y=60 to Y=108. It consists of multiple Graves with loot chests under them. Grave robbing anyone?

Dark Ruins:
  Dark Ruins are large clusters of buildings
found underground at Y=0 and lower. The buildings are primarily made up of Dark Brick variants. Night Vision potions are a must.
